insult.desc: A Hussein-style insult generator. Takes in a user-specified ethnicity as an input.
insult.exoutput: Listen here, you greasy Italian cuck!

setgame.desc: Sets Hussein Bot's presence on Discord (shown in the member list).

smite.desc: Strips the mentioned user of their basic human rights. Only wieldable by the bot's creator, and will not work on admins.

unsmite.desc: Returns basic human rights to the mentioned user. Only wieldable by the bot's creator.

pizzatime.desc: Joins the current voice channel and plays the Pizza Theme from Spider-Man 2.
pizzatime.params: User must be in a voice channel

england.desc: Returns the lyrics of the best verse from It's Everyday Bro. Adding the `play` argument will play said verse in the current voice channel.
england.params: `play` (optional; user must be in a voice channel)

doajig.desc: Hussein Bot reaffirms his servitude to you with a little jig and a potentially offensive picture.

obliterate.desc: Returns a gif of the famous "Exodia Obliterate" scene from everyone's favorite anime based off of a children's card game. Mentioning <@219615190629613578> will instead return some classic fanart from <@278696840227061761>.

m.desc: The base command for photo macros. Returns the specified image from the database, if it exists. See `!help m create`, `!help m search`, `!help m delete`, and `!help m list` for other commands related to the macro feature.

m create.desc: Allows the user to add their own macros to the database.

m search.desc: Searches the database for the specified macro. Currently the search is case-sensitive, though this will likely change in a future revision.

m delete.desc: Allows the user to delete macros that they have created. Attempting to delete macros created by another user will result in failure.

m list.desc: Returns a list of all current macros in the database.
